q1: This team is going to win
a1: I think they can only win if they find a new playstyle.
a2: Mostly defend, and try to counter attack when possible and play possession.
q3: if spain played a more aggressive style do you think they would win more or less?
a3: Most senior players have crossed their peak years
q4: Yes, do you think they have enough young players for the next cup?
a4: I feel that they have to bring enough young people but also experienced players
q5: how many young players do you think they need?
a5: 11 just to clear out the old crew.
